introduction: Johnny Caruso, nephew and godson of the infamous Don Caruso, is forced to move to New York from Catania after the tragic death of his father. Johnny seeks wealth and success in the city that never sleeps, but before he can act on his ambition, he is coerced into the family business. Reluctantly accepting the life of a gangster, Johnny soon becomes indispensable, the right-hand of a very powerful man. After Johnny meets the beautiful Marianne, he reaps the benefits of the good life, until the lines between love, respect and business clash, leaving Johnny with an impossible choice - her love, his uncle, or his life.
